author: kingpanther13
releaseNotes:
v0.4.7 - Comprehensive bug fixes from code review:

- Fix state persistence: mcpLog nested mutation now reassigns top-level state
- Fix Hub Security auth retry: all hub internal methods retry once on cookie expiry
- Fix collectDeviceIds missing multi-device triggers (deviceIds plural array)
- Fix time_range condition: handle bare HH:mm strings (toDateTime requires ISO 8601)
- Fix days_of_week locale dependency: use Locale.US for consistent day names
- Fix substituteVariables: now resolves rule engine variables, not just hub connector vars
- Fix restore_state flash: devices restoring to 'off' no longer briefly flash on
- Fix delay overwrite: multiple delays in same rule no longer clobber each other
- Fix parameter conversion: handles edge cases gracefully with try-catch
- Fix HSM previousStatus: captured before sendLocationEvent instead of after

v0.4.6 - Fix version mismatch bug in optimistic locking
v0.4.5 - Smart large-file handling (chunked reading, resave mode, sourceFile mode)
